definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Thirdly, to obtain employment successfully, ex-servicemen should bring into play their predominance themselves too.
sentences.chinese: 再者，退役軍人在就業時也應當注意發揮自身優勢。

sentences.english: Furthermore I style of writing is good, have published in newspapers and periodicals 6 article.
sentences.chinese: 再者，我的文筆較好，曾在報刊上發表過6篇文章。
再者說，她們也不會相信我。

sentences.english: Is furthermore small and soft to calculate, queen mother this undertaking really has already lost advisability.
sentences.chinese: 再者細細推算，太后此舉委實有失明智。

sentences.english: Third, regional differences are also shown in the various income elasticities .
sentences.chinese: 再者，省市間差異亦顯現在所得彈性上。

sentences.english: Next, an analysis of Professor Hsiao's commentary style in annotating lyric is followed, so as to see his great learning and personality.
sentences.chinese: 再者，分析蕭先生的評賞風格，以見學人的襟懷氣度。

sentences.english: Moreover, artists from different backgrounds do not raise their doubts in similar manners.
sentences.chinese: 再者，不同處境的藝術家，提出質疑的方式又很不同。

sentences.english: Furthermore, we make us get a small profits only with low price.
sentences.chinese: 再者，我們的低價使我們僅獲薄利。

sentences.english: Plus, most of my friends use Apple," Myles Geissler, 25, said while shopping for an iPhone in Sydney.
sentences.chinese: 再者說，我的許多朋友都在用蘋果手機。

sentences.english: In addition, early rising is also good to our health.
sentences.chinese: 再者，夙起對我們健康也有益處。

sentences.english: Furthermore I do not know its absolute meaning.
sentences.chinese: 再者，我不知道它絕對性的含意。

sentences.english: "Else I must go back to Guy of Gisborne, being his man, " he answered.
sentences.chinese: 再者，我是蓋吉斯朋的人，就應該回去。

sentences.english: Moreover, it's probably not money well spent -- at least in the developing world.
sentences.chinese: 再者，至少在發展中國家，撥款於加固工程不合算。

sentences.english: Furthermore, this article compares the temple funds in Guihua with those in Dolonnur and other regions.
sentences.chinese: 再者，比較歸化和多倫諾爾及其他地方寺廟的經費。

sentences.english: Besides that, I'm basically the original article.
sentences.chinese: 再者說了，我基本上都是原創文章。

sentences.english: And how much did the government spend on this investigation, anyway?
sentences.chinese: 再者，紀檢調查此事，又花了多少錢？

definition: let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
